caption.p: Results of herbivory in lab results from 3 herbivores ( A) number of A. craccivora (Y-axis) (P < 0.001; Poisson distribution fit model regression), ( B) mass gain of M. sexta caterpillars (Y-axis) (P = 0.022; Kruskal–Wallis test) and ( C) mass gain of L. texana (Y-axis) on mowed (orange bar) and unmowed (blue bar) plants (P = 0.715; Kruskal–Wallis test). Means are shown by scale bars and asterisk denotes significantly different results at p < 0.05, while ns denotes non-significant results.
